title: Introducing: Tallows
body:
Just when you thought new music had closed up shop for 2012, one of the best new acts of the year rears their head.

The project of **Josh Hogsett** and a few currently anonymous friends, **Tallows** merges influences and sounds ranging from **Death Cab For Cutie**, **Fleet Foxes** and recent success story **fun.** producing these fantastic two debut tracks. Perfectly rounded indie pop at it’s most accessible, enjoyable and coherent, **Tallows** are one of the finest new bands of the year.
